title: Ultra Rapid Fire mod koomt balt yaaaaaa

embed.description: Phase Drive (E) Parallel Convergence (W) Passive base damage lowered to 3% missing HP from 5% missing HP Passive AP ratio increased to 1% per 33 AP from 1% per 50 AP [NEW] Passive does minimum 15 damage to minions Base damage lowered to 40/65/90/115/140 from 50/80/110/140/170 AP ratio increased
